list.name: Changes
list.comment: Added Lantern, LargePortrait, Orrery, and Phonograph item stubs. Began finishing touches on Conservatory room decoration/props and puzzle clues. Implemented a series of conditional checks to correctly determine the next room based on the room the player is in when they interact with the exit door

task.summary: Worked on finishing the system for moving the player between rooms. I had to rework some of the exit door code, but now have it working properly. Cheers!
Worked on finishing the system for our assignment 5 by implementing a Comparable and Comparator in the high scores system.
Got my changes finished which implement the RoomSetup Class to streamline room creation. Hope you guys like it!

Fixed Transmorgrifier interaction menu loop to behave as expected. Modified Room.describeItemsToPlayer to include a grammar formatter Cleaned up perceptual feedback output generally. Debug output is now purple, and any time the player receives some kind of perceptual feedback, it is now preceded by an 'PERCEPTION' indicator. Grouped up debug messages and created space between them and perceptual feedback Changed 'highscores' command to 'hiscores' to reduce player keystroke requirements Changed MakeRoom method naming conventions to allow for greater uniformity in our method calls (syntax is now MakeRoom_RoomName)
Some further cleanup work to diegetic feedback to improve player experience and readability
Some further (I swear to god actual final update of the night) cleanup work to diegetic feedback to improve player experience and readability
Some additional narrative output spacing cleanup
Color-coded usable items in tutorial room descriptions
Added option to speedrun the first room for purposes of developing lab

Implemented some very slightly different item handling to ref. item instead of name where relevant Implemented Observer pattern to compare relative toggled status of Conservatory levers Fixed usable item coloring of key in Tutorial Room Added some additional debug feedback for item usage info
Fixed spacing of debug messages relative to diegetic feedback

Added Lantern, LargePortrait, Orrery, and Phonograph item stubs. Began finishing touches on Conservatory room decoration/props and puzzle clues. Implemented a series of conditional checks to correctly determine the next room based on the room the player is in when they interact with the exit door

MESSAGE.value: starting point
moved main.java into correct folder
added logging. Yay!
fixed broken logging/package issue. This should work again
added property: name to the Room class to allow for further extensibility
Implemented printCommands() method and handling for input: "help" or "?". Added some color and spacial formatting to text output to improve legibility
Implemented printTitle() method and placeholder title "ESCAPE ROOM" with rad ASCII font. Some additional cleanup of unnecessary line breaks which disrupted text flow
Moved ANSI color values into ConsoleColors class to mitigate redundant use of variables. Updated references to color variables to point at the ConsoleColors class.
re-submitting to ensure that we are all working from the same codebase
implemented Item.use() method. Separated items out as children of the Item class. Got the Key item to fall out from behind the painting onto the floor but that logic is not yet complete.
added some contextual awareness to the message provided to player when they attempt to use or inspect an item they haven't yet observed.
Worked on finishing the system for moving the player between rooms. I had to rework some of the exit door code, but now have it working properly. Cheers!
Worked on finishing the system for our assignment 5 by implementing a Comparable and Comparator in the high scores system.
Got my changes finished which implement the RoomSetup Class to streamline room creation. Hope you guys like it!

Fixed Transmorgrifier interaction menu loop to behave as expected. Modified Room.describeItemsToPlayer to include a grammar formatter Cleaned up perceptual feedback output generally. Debug output is now purple, and any time the player receives some kind of perceptual feedback, it is now preceded by an 'PERCEPTION' indicator. Grouped up debug messages and created space between them and perceptual feedback Changed 'highscores' command to 'hiscores' to reduce player keystroke requirements Changed MakeRoom method naming conventions to allow for greater uniformity in our method calls (syntax is now MakeRoom_RoomName)
Some further cleanup work to diegetic feedback to improve player experience and readability
Some further (I swear to god actual final update of the night) cleanup work to diegetic feedback to improve player experience and readability
Some additional narrative output spacing cleanup
Color-coded usable items in tutorial room descriptions
clarified color coding methodology in ConsoleColors class
Added option to speedrun the first room for purposes of developing lab

Implemented some very slightly different item handling to ref. item instead of name where relevant Implemented Observer pattern to compare relative toggled status of Conservatory levers Fixed usable item coloring of key in Tutorial Room Added some additional debug feedback for item usage info
Fixed spacing of debug messages relative to diegetic feedback

Added Lantern, LargePortrait, Orrery, and Phonograph item stubs. Began finishing touches on Conservatory room decoration/props and puzzle clues. Implemented a series of conditional checks to correctly determine the next room based on the room the player is in when they interact with the exit door
